website_summaries.verdict: This durable braided cable offers a longer reach than other surge protectors, combining security and convenience in an attractive-looking model.
pros: This GE cord is available in black and white
Braided nylon cord casing is durable enough to avoid tangles and wear
Doubles as a surge protector, so users can plug in high-power devices like computers and televisions
Longer and more durable than most surge protectors
cons: Outlets are spaced more closely than on some surge protectors, which may cause a space issue for users with multiple power cords with large heads

customer_reviews.title: Really very nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's funny how a little thing like a cloth wrap on the cord can make a product seem so much nicer and higher end. It does slide over itself and across shelf corners where a rubber/plastic cord would get stuck or tangled, so it's practical too. Really, the flat, angled plug on this this is half of what makes it so excellent. I use it behind my turntable/record shelf, and it would probably not fit if it were a standard straight plug. I do really wish that this thing had a master on/off switch like bigger power bars do, but that's a pretty minor gripe. All in all, really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gore

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Wire comes out and to the right only.
customer_reviews.text: This cord gives plenty of room and the wire feels both strong and flexible. I didn’t realize that the cord comes out to the right of the switch, which isn’t a big deal, since you have a lot of room with the cord, but it is something to take not of if you will need all 8 feet for your purposes. Also, it only has 3 outlets, which is fine, but if you are plugging in a bulky laptop cord, you have more like 2 outlets, unless your other 2 plugs are very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Extension Cord With Surge Protection
customer_reviews.text: An extension cord with surge protection, what a terrific idea! No longer do you need to buy a huge surge protector, you can just get this and it gives you three convenient outlets. The low-profile prong is great when you want this plugged flat against the wall, and the braided cord is good at keeping this tangle-free. I think my only question is: how do we know this cord has done its job of protecting your devices from a surge? Does it stop working? It would be great if the manufacturer could clarify. I got two of these and they are very handy around the house. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin bannisterTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good surge protector, but the cable is too heavy for desktop use
customer_reviews.text: The surge protector doesn't appear to have any defects and I always appreciate angled wall plugs, but the braided cable is insanely heavy compared to the unit itself so it can't really sit on top of a table or desk without being pulled down by the weight of the cable. Still a good buy if you're okay with leaving it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: ethanet

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I plugged it in right after I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I plugged it in right after I got it out of the packaging and it did not work. I tried many different outlets and nothing seemed to get this cord to work.
customer_reviews.author: Heather/Jen

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE EXTENSION CORD
customer_reviews.text: Truly a beautiful looking extension cord, that looks about as classy as one of these can look. The braided cable is handsome, strong, and flexible. The flat plug is totally convenient and doesn't get in the way of other plugs. I have the version without USB, but I kind of wish I had gotten the USB version
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve plugged this into 3 different outlets and it ruined each of them. Actual flames have come out and burned the outlets. Buy a different extension cord so you don’t burn down your house like I almost did
customer_reviews.author: James Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Wow are these high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these, for places where I need to extend the wall socket (duh) and though they're mostly hidden, they'd be somewhat visual; white is much better than brown for me (and way better than orange for this use!), and I couldn't be more pleased. They're super high quality and look so good that I don't mind at all that you can see them. They are a little stiff and so if you have a very tight turn right next to the outlet they might not be for you. Not incredibly stiff, they bend fine, but the quality of the cloth wrapping does make them less flexible than a purely plastic cord.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Blows a fuse every time I want to use this
customer_reviews.text: I had kept this cord on the side and when I wanted to use this earlier this week it blows a fuse every time. In other words it is a defect and would like to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mazal

customer_reviews.title: great and pretty cheap
customer_reviews.text: great and pretty cheap. nice long cord. plug is angled off to the right. nice braided cord. much nicer construction than i was anticipating.
customer_reviews.author: SW2

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two out of the three plugs do NOT work!!!! Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Yun Wei

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: My son bought me this because I needed to plug in more things. I really wanted a 6-outlet extension. It works fine and the wrapped cord will probably last a long time. I have no complaints about it. I prefer a longer-corded surge protector type items with room to plug in six items, so it's not fair to judge this based on that. Because it is as described and works well, I gave it 5 stars. My son bought this because it was cheaper than the longer ones that accepted more plugs. I think if you need this length and need to plug in two more things, it will be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMomHikerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy at best
customer_reviews.text: Killed two phone chargers in a week. Something is definitely not right with this extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice high quality cords that don't look ugly
customer_reviews.text: Nice high quality cords that don't look ugly. The braided cloth(?) wires add a nice touch and dont look like the typical ugly plastic looking expension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one a long time ago and forgot to review, but recently we had a thunderstorm come through, and I had both my phone and my iPad charging on this extender. Our power went out, but my devices didn’t dry. I’m grateful to this cord for protecting my precious gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Sleeplessdomore

customer_reviews.title: Offsets to the right
customer_reviews.text: I like that this plug offsets to the right side of the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: D Hill

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy when I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy when I bought this, it has a great design and doesn’t tangle and twist like other cords. BUT after using it for a month the middle plug doesn’t work. Ready to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Yusico

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard
customer_reviews.text: I recently plugged this in after it sat for a while. Flames shot out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Very well made with a limp extension
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extension cord to run from the top of my bookshelf to behind my wall-mounted TV as we got rid of our entertainment center to make more room in the living room for our Great Danes to run around. I was looking for 3 specifics: 1) at least a 6' cord, preferred longer but not more than 10' 2) Flexible and attractive cord 3) At lease 3 plug-ins in a row stacked vertically so I could utilize my smart plug. This thing met all my requirements and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful of Dirt
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive product that works well. It does its job, is quite long and has been the middleman between two surge protectors at opposite ends of the room. My only comment would be to be careful with the actual chord. As it is not plastic, but cloth-like and gets dirty quickly. It went from being pristine white to gray over the course of a few weeks due to dirt, dust from outside, shoes and cats.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Solid and nice looking extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Coming from cheap and crappy dollar store extension cords, this is really a world of difference, and it's no longer something i'd be ashamed to leave hanging around. The cord is nice and thick and won't tangle, while being flexible enough to lay nicely flat on the ground on any position. It's a no brainer and have bought a few of these already to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Fecommended, heavy/thick.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cord because it has the full outlets at the end where I can plug in my laptop. The plug-in part comes off of the outlet to the side a bit and that is nice for plugging things in underneath it. It has a good length too/reaches easily the width of my bed. I'm sure I could travel with it but it is kind of thick so I don't due to its size/weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Would’ve paid $500 for this if it had a supreme logo on it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t buy many extension cords but this has to be the nicest one I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great extension cord!
customer_reviews.text: I love this extension cord! I pet sit and often stay over at people’s houses to do so. I keep this in my overnight bag! Then I don’t have to struggle to get my phone plugged in when the night stand plug in is inconvenient behind the bed, already filled up with lamp cords, etc. no problem! I just use another plug in! With my extension cord handy I can still charge and use my phone on the sofa, in bed, etc!
customer_reviews.author: AnnM Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this extension cord!
customer_reviews.text: Love the clean design on this extension cord! Looks very modern and nice in our house, I love that I don't have to fuss with a tangled plastic cord and it actually looks nice where the cord is exposed. I also like how the cord comes out of the side of the plug, so that you can easily plug it in behind furniture without kinking the cord or pulling your furniture out awkwardly. I plan to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great design and product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. In our master bedroom we only have 1 outlet on the headboard wall, right in the middle of the bed. So we bought two of these and have one going to each nightstand for a lamp and charging cables. Works great. Really like the thick power cable and the fact that it's nice and flush to the outlet when plugged in. Really good design
customer_reviews.author: B. Long

customer_reviews.title: Now I have plugs by my side!
customer_reviews.text: My gf subsconsciously lays on the side of the bed that has the wall outlets next to them. She hogs both plugs and I don't want to reach over her all the time. Got this little thing and plugged it into the surge protector on the wall by the foot of the bed. Problem solved lol Now I have 3 "3 prongers" while she's got her 2 "2s". All kidding aside the product is exactly what I wanted. Got laptop and phone plugged in. I've had this for a couple months now and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Raf022

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: We first plugged a phone charger directly into the wall outlet, which worked fine, and second, through this extension cord, which did not work 90% of the time, and 10% of the time did work but was intermittent. This is a faulty unit. The cord is also very thick, stiff and hard to work with.
customer_reviews.author: aninonymous

customer_reviews.title: A Well-Built Extension Cord
customer_reviews.text: I love these cords. Only one thing could make them better...a swiveling plug. If you have to go to the left, then you lose a few inches in the cord, and you have a loop. Belkin makes a cord with a swiveling plug, but I don't like the plain vinyl cord. The GE cord is a cloth braided cord that is very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good deal (I guess it could be to some) BUT I was at Home Depot today and they sell this exact same thing for the exact same price only 10 feet instead of 8. *shrug*
customer_reviews.author: Brittany RR

customer_reviews.title: just want i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a surge protector just for my laptop to plug into. I was only wanting a few ports on the surge protector. I only got it today, but it looks great and seems to be working great. The cable is long, I was only expecting a 3 ft cable for some reason, maybe I read it wrong. But the cable seems long. Great item for the cost. Mine is the one without the usb ports.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Quality material  .... protection ... at an affordable price  ....
customer_reviews.text: With so much money invested in my electronics ... this is an inexpensive solution to the risk of unexpected power surges ... The product seems to be of substantial quality for a reasonable price ... hopefully I won't have to experience a power surge to test that fact ...
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it would be much more expensive than it was
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think there was too much to say about an extension cord, but this is the nicest one I have ever purchased. Looks like it would be much more expensive than it was. I love that you can push furniture close to the wall with how flat the plug is.
customer_reviews.author: mrsg820

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: One of the 3 outlets doesn’t work after only 2 months. I would not recommend getting this overpriced piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Bought another one because it works so well
customer_reviews.text: Works great! This is the second one I’ve purchased because it works so well. The first one I’ve got is 2 years old and still works, i just needed another one because I have so many cords. I use this for my Apple Watch charger, Mac book charger and phone charger. If you need more plugs I definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect FLEXIBLE extension cord!
customer_reviews.text: Great extension cord! Very flexible so it can wrap around objects easily. The flat plug is great and tucks into the wall perfectly. I bought three of them and will gladly purchase again if needed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: squeegee

customer_reviews.title: It's an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a heavy duty extension cord that had some sort of protection but nothing extreme. This fit the bill at a good price so I ordered it. It came as promised and it's working great. Will buy it again if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: George A Kovacic

customer_reviews.title: Can an extension cord be stylish?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty slick. We needed an extension cord to go behind a piece of furniture and have it pop out where its visible in our living room. This cord looks and feels very nice. It reminds me of USB cables that are braided... just a general premium feel. I also like how its only 3 outlets - small form factor is perfect for our use case.
customer_reviews.author: King_Bear

customer_reviews.title: My go to cord
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my room because now I can plug things into my wall without my bed destroying the cord. It saves me lots of space too. Perfect length and lasted me a very long time. No complaints. I think from on now ill always buy these type of cords for any situations
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It's an Extension Cord and It Does This Job Very Well
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted, which was an extension cord of this length, in a white color so it doesn't stand out too much and with a flat plug to help keep the cord close to the wall - this cord fit all of these requirements well.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN in CA

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in and all!
customer_reviews.text: What else can you really say about an extension cord, amirite? It has a nice angular plug, so it sneaks behind our chest quickly. Three outlets all work. Cord was as long as advertised. I'm liking the braided wires more than regular plastic... looks classier. If you want something to turn your one plug into three, this will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzou41

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh it does the job for now
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cord to replace an old one that my charger kept falling out of. Though I enjoy most of the construction of the cord, I can see that I will have the same problem with my chargers very quickly because they already have a loose fit.
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: 3 prong extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with flat plug and braided cord. Glad I got this instead of the cheap generic one at the drugstore. Works with my Brother printer. The cord is connected to the plug on the right side which is not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Slayr

customer_reviews.title: Great Extension cable for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace the fire hazard that has presumably been passed down for 3 generations in my wife's family. This Extension is nice to look at, doesn't get tangled and feels very durable. We have cats that sometimes like to get in fights with cables and this one seems pretty immune to that kind of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Morkeleb

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best extension cord ever! I hate my other extension cords because how awesome this one is. The cord I almost moldable and the flat part for wall outlet just makes sense. The price is very fair for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for college dorms
customer_reviews.text: Going into college, I was looking for a suitable extension cord that was durable! One good thing about this cord is that it has a braided cable, so it doesn't really like to curl, nor will it easily be broken. I have personally tripped over my cord a couple of times, and so far, there have been no issues. One thing to note is that it only has 3 plugs. I wish there would be a few more. But, other than that, it is a great cable!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Goh

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Wanted my printer in a location, but it's cable wouldn't reach the outlet, this fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lady~J

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extension cord for my television and dvd player in my bedroom. It needed to have a long cord and multiple outlets. It has not disappointed and it lays flat along the wall so it is not in the way. No problems with the product at all to date.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: About as attractive as you can make an extension cord
customer_reviews.text: It's an extension cord, and while there's nothing wild about that this was a great product. I love the angled plug to squeeze it behind objects, the textured cord helps it blend in, and the power flows like it should. Overall, I'll look to these for all my indoor extension cord needs.
customer_reviews.author: ProudPapa34

customer_reviews.title: Lay-flat plug and high quality braided cord make these a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The lay flat plug head is so important. Even if you aren't trying to use an outlet behind a couch, this style is great for a seamless look on your wall. The cord looked really nice in person. Bought quite a few!
customer_reviews.author: Sta So

customer_reviews.title: Great, except one thing
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed to see I'd need to buy a whole new $15 bit set for my screwdriver just to get one special "Y" bit in order to unscrew the plastic casing. I need to drill holes in it so I can mount it to the wall, but I obviously can't do that while it's screwed together.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Tayara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful braided power cable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful braided power cable! Perfect for a wall mounted tv. I didn't even have to run it through a channel since the braid is very high quality. I tested each port and they're wired correctly.
customer_reviews.author: dwight scott

customer_reviews.title: Need another one
customer_reviews.text: This works great for our older home that has oddly placed outlets. With three prongs we can use it for more than just charging devices. My kids have told me we need another one. I really prefer the look of this cord to the old extension cords & will happily buy at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I respect electricity, and prefer all my cables/cords be extra-sturdy. This one definitely is well made, and I feel safe using it. Can't say much about the surge protection, but I don't really care about that.
customer_reviews.author: mzimmers

customer_reviews.title: Extremely high quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Tesla of extension cables. I purchased this in order to make a nice extension to a bidet, the quality of this cable is extremely good, and looks great when properly affixed to a wall. Having surge protection is a great additional feature of this, and is priced amazingly for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanial Madanick

customer_reviews.title: Nice low profile plug head, perfect for behind a dresser
customer_reviews.text: The cord and cord covering look to be durable and stylish. I used this to plug in a TV that sits on a dresser, with the plug behind. The flush plug head is important in this application.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cord
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cord to replace my old extension cord. It’s stylish for an extension cord. It sometimes stops charging my phone, though. I’ve even bought a new cord and cube from Apple thinking it was my phone charger but it still randomly quits working. Not really sure what’s going on with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, cord is flexible but NOT A SURGE PROTECTOR....purchased for that purpose....
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made and Sturdy/Durable Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed, it has 3 outlets and has a relatively slim side plug that goes into the wall. The cord is braided very well and seems "armored"
customer_reviews.author: ckluh

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm not picky about extension cords, but this fit nicely where I wanted it to go and I like the fabric cord. It's more attractive since this is visible in my house. So far, I've used all of the plugs at the same time with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 devices, not 3.
customer_reviews.text: Great extension cord if you want to plug in only 2 devices. A third one will not fit. I have 2 Apple devices and one DexCom CGM receiver to be charged each night. All 3 will not fit
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Length, Flat Plug In
customer_reviews.text: I loved the flat plug aspect of this long cord as it was going behind a bed up against a wall. The length was the real draw. Does not warm when in use. Seemingly good material for price.
customer_reviews.author: T Ward

customer_reviews.title: ... cord in my craft room and this one is perfect! I love the flat outlet part and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a power strip with a long enough cord in my craft room and this one is perfect! I love the flat outlet part and the cord feels nice and sturdy and less likely to get damaged! Not a whole lot to say about it, just fit my needs!
customer_reviews.author: TrishaJB

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this very long yet, but the product build quality seems good. I like the braided cable as it looks nice and is flexible enough. Little more boojie than your typical extension cable.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for using behind a wall mounted TV.
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this extension behind my wall mounted TV. Due to the location of the outlet and where the AC adapter comes out from the TV, I needed this exact product for the power. I recommend this extension cord. I’ve been using this for the last few months.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tajima

customer_reviews.title: SOFT,  PLIABLE & ALMOST INVISIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. Just remodeled my office and family room with gray pattern carpeting. Some of my electrical outlets are exposed and I didn’t want to see any of the heavy, stiff black cords. This cord is pliable and the color blends so well into the carpeting, that you can’t even see it.
customer_reviews.author: PjPete

customer_reviews.title: High quality material used and doesn't tangle!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed. Eight feet version provides a lot of reach and the cord and outlet are of good quality. It's good to know my things are protected from power surges with this. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I know it is just an extension cord but it is very nice. It will be seen so I wanted something a little better than the standard cord. I was pleasantly surprised. Just which the black was in stock and not so long for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but awkward design
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I have this 4 stars is because the cord comes out of the bottom angled to the right which makes it very awkward to use if you need the cord to go to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not fully functional.
customer_reviews.text: Came with only two of the three outlets working. Annoyed, but not enough to send it back. Not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and it's functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and it's functional. The slim plug design is perfect for saving space and the fabric cord is a nice touch for when a cord needs to show. One star off because I didn't see the prop 65 warning on the sales page but it's on the package.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cord, would buy another.  Really like the cable covering.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, good insertion and firm hold on the plugs. Nice flexible cord, well protected with the woven covering. Is also nice and slick, so it doesn't get tangled up in things, or itself, like a rubber cord.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cole

customer_reviews.title: The flat plug!
customer_reviews.text: The right angled/ flat plug is really what I needed which this product has. The braided cord and general construction seems solid for the price. Can't say about longevity as it was a relatively new purchase but my first impressions are very positive.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Zeeshan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality item. I needed one with a flat, turned, plug end. Fits my needs 100%. Would buy again if I have need for another one.
customer_reviews.author: breadbaker

customer_reviews.title: Great extension cord with built-in Surge guard
customer_reviews.text: They sell similar extension cords that look exactly like this one at around the same price, but this one also has a built-in surge protector and states so right on the box. I don't know if the other ones have surge protection or not, but why wouldn't a brand mention that on the box if they did? Buy this one, just to be on the safe side!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Animal

customer_reviews.title: Bought a couple of these
customer_reviews.text: They look good and give an extra touch on boring extension cords- I got a couple of these and they have not let me down - I would yes buy again
customer_reviews.author: markb

customer_reviews.title: Iconic American company shipped their products to China for production ...
customer_reviews.text: Iconic American company shipped their products to China for production. Additional molding betwixt the cord and connectors reduces stress from normal use. Braided cloth cord won't stink when exposed to petroleum distillates.
customer_reviews.author: NotRickJames

customer_reviews.title: This is a great slim profile threaded extension chord
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slim profile threaded extension chord. It's nothing special, but it's fairly flush and fits behind our headboard for our bed, so we're able to keep the headboard flush with the wall and not lose access to the outlets behind the bed. Very happy with this cord so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but why only three prongs?
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and very long which is why I got it, but why not 4-5 plugs? I didn't think I would find it frustrating, but it is a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Lexis B

customer_reviews.title: Sub par quality sadly
customer_reviews.text: I have had two already stop working and both of them only lasted a week from first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An extension / surge cord that won't have to hide
customer_reviews.text: Due to limitation of outlets in the bathroom, I've had to extend some outlets across the counter. Any other cord than this was just too unsightly to have route through the counter of the bathroom. But his cord makes it minimally bearable and will do until I can find an electrician to route an extra outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described. The cord is a kind of cloth wrapped around the plastic power cables? Not sure what it's made of but it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: The Conklin Family

customer_reviews.title: An affordable option that does the job as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As part of my move, I needed some affordable extension cords quickly. This came quickly and did the job well. The length was just what I needed, and it has the third prong (ground) as well. This was a reliable purchase that does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! So far it's doing what it's supposed to do! Very happy I bought it for tree lights at Christmas. Definitely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great extension cable.
customer_reviews.text: There's only three ports on this so if you're just looking to give your outlet some distance this is great. Chord is very easy and flexible. Power strip feel like all power strips, plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Fizward

customer_reviews.title: Needed this
customer_reviews.text: Needed an extension cord, saw this and purchased it. Have an older house that doesn't have a lot of outlets and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Great for places like behind the couch, where you have power but can’t reach. Braided cord is nice and thick so it’s extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Prfine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mediun long no-tangle cord
customer_reviews.text: The plug is great, the cord is braided no-tangle, tough, good guage, medium long, the outlets are also great. Built in surge suppression. No complain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TCCozby

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy cord that doesn’t twist. Really works as described and the cord won’t twist. I like that it’s by a trusted brand like GE.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought both the black and white versions of these. Love the look of the wrapped cord and the flexibility of these. We ended up buying more to replace other cords we were using. Preferred the quality and look of these vs. the ones we had.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Burba

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This extension cord was better than I anticipated. I really needed a good reliable extension because the one I had, you barely touched and it would turn all of my gadgets off. This works great. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A Flores

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend - Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the box and it doesn’t work at all. Of course return window already passed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Attractive - Won't Tangle - Surge Protection
customer_reviews.text: Attractive thick cloth cord in white and grey colors. Strong long cord with surge protection of 250 Joules. Won't tangle.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, this ext cord is as expected. Seems like good quality for a GE label product. May purchase another?
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Husband said “what did you get that for?” A month later he needed an extension cord, guess what I used. It’s very nice heavy duty sturdy. I actually purchased to take when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: mare e

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Extension Cord
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice extension cord. The plug sits flat off the outlet rather than sticking out. The cord is nicely wrapped in a fabric with a premium feel. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: i barely bought this cord a couple days ago. and it does not work anymore!!! i thought it would work. worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's an classy extension cord.
customer_reviews.text: It does its job not really much to say besides that. It feels great in the hands. It's pricey but it's brand name so I trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look and feel to the cord
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look and feel to the cord. There's still an odd battle between wall wart deignerss and plugs about which way to rotate the plugs or the wall warts. I think in the end this cord would be better off if the plugs were spaced slightly farther apart and rotated 90 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Victor H.

customer_reviews.title: I love that my cats aren't able to even try chewing ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that my cats aren't able to even try chewing this cord up! The flat plug is perfect to fit behind my bed frame, and the cord is plenty long to run to my bedside table. Three plugs are just enough for my humidifier, phone charger, and 1 to spare. The only downside is the outlets are pretty close together, so you have to be a little choosy when you have larger things to plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

product_meta.title: GE Designer Extension Cord With Surge Protection, Braided Power Cord, 8 ft, 3 Grounded Outlets, Flat Plug, Premium, Gray/White, 38433
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:8 Ft| Pattern Name:SingleGet easy access to outlets with the GE Pro designer extension cord, 8 foot, 3 outlets, gray and white. The extension cord, equipped with three AC outlets, is perfect for added convenience and flexibility while covering all of your charging needs. It features a fabric braided cord that resists tangles. The GE Pro designer extension cord is also equipped with a low-profile plug so it stays close to the wall and out of the way. This product is UL listed and intended for indoor use only. USB charging cable not included. Warning: This product contains chemicals known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects (or other reproductive harm). Wash hands after handling.*
feature_bullets: Power more: 3 grounded outlets allow you to charge and power more devices at once
Stylish: the flat plug design in addition to the braided, high quality cord add to the aesthetic of any room
Extended reach: 8 foot, extra long power cord provides optimal reach from your outlet to devices
Tangle free: braided cord resists tangles, eliminating the frustration and time of untangling cords
Protection: Includes surge protection with a 250 joule protection rating and is UL listed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,665 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
